snippet.title: Max Payne Katana Mod - Official Trailer 1 (2003)
snippet.description:
The first offical trailer for the Max Payne total conversion 'Katana', created by Maddieman and StratonAce.  

This trailer was made back in 2003 by Strat, and perfectly captures the cinematic feel of the mod, even at this early stage in development.

http://hellskitchen.paynereactor.com/

CREDITS:
Video and Editing by StratonAce 
Music: "Sleep Now" By Hughes Hall, Dark City Soundtrack
"Black Fairy" Silent Hill 2 Soundtrack
Orignal Concept based on Genryu's Blade (C) Shock Anime
